name: Non-negative Usage
message: The usage can be 0, but it must never be negative.

name: Return Not Null
message: The return can be 0, but has to be filled.

name: Hourly Readings Interval
message: Readings should have intervals of 1 hour for each ean.

name: EAN 18-digit Numeric String
message: EAN values must always be 18-digit numeric strings.

name: Return Value Required for SDS
message: If the source is SDS, the return value must be filled.
